body.p: It is likely that the recoverable amount of each plant cannot be assessed independently because:

li.p: there is no active market for A’s products. Therefore, A’s cash inflows depend on sales of the final product by B and C.

although there is an active market for the products assembled by B and C, cash inflows for B and C depend on the allocation of production across the two sites. It is unlikely that the future cash inflows for B and C can be determined individually.
